name: FIFE ONE DESIGN

images.alt: Fife One Design photo on sailboatdata.com

notes: Also called CONWAY FIFE ONE DESIGN. (Not to be confused with the CONWAY ONE DESIGN.) Still raced at Royal Anglesey Yacht Club. Most of original 15 built at Bangor are still sailing. In recent years 22 G.R.P. boats have been added to the fleet.
